DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety tolerability MK6186 change baseline plasma HIV-1 RNA seven consecutive day dose .
DOC.brief_title: MK6186 HIV-1 Infected Patients ( MK-6186-007 AM2 )
DOC.criteria: Other HIV infection , patient 's baseline health judge stable Patient document HIV1 positive Patient receive investigational agent license ART past 30 day Patient history stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disease Patient history cancer Patient use immune therapy agent immunosuppressive therapy within past month Patient require anticipates use prescription nonprescription drug study Patient current diagnosis acute hepatitis , history Hepatitis C positive Hepatitis B surface antigen Patient consume excessive amount alcohol ( great 3 serving per day ) caffeine ( great 6 serving per day ) Patient excessive smoker ( 10 cigarette per day ) Patient major surgery , donate blood participate another investigational study within past 4 week
